snippet: In a letter, the Brazilian soccer great gave a strong endorsement for Jérôme Champagne’s bid to replace Sepp Blatter.
abstract: Brazilian soccer great Pele gives strong endorsement to Jerome Champagne in his run for the presidency of FIFA, world governing body of soccer.
lead_paragraph: In a letter, the Brazilian soccer great gave a strong endorsement for Jérôme Champagne’s bid to replace Sepp Blatter.

headline.main: Pelé Backs Frenchman for FIFA Presidency
headline.print_headline: Frenchman’s Challenge for Top FIFA Post Draws Support From Pelé
